title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 55 - Cancellation And Destruction Of Obligations Of Municipalities, School Districts And District Corporations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 55 - Cancellation And Destruction Of Obligations Of Municipalities, School Districts And District Corporations

State Regulations
§ 55.1 - Cancellation of paid obligations
§ 55.2 - Destruction of cancelled obligations
§ 55.3 - Destruction of obligations by registration agents
§ 55.4 - Cancellation of coupons by counties or cities
§ 55.5 - Burning, pulverizing or shredding of obligations
§ 55.6 - Records to be kept
§ 55.7 - Use of facsimile signature
§ 55.8 - Cancellation and destruction of partially destroyed or defaced obligations
§ 55.9 - Effective date

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 55

Statutory authority: Local Finance Law, §
63.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
